q5.question: How does miller die?
q5.answer: ['Blast from a German Tiger Tank shell', 'Shot in the chest by a German soldier he freed.']
q5.recall: Miller dies when he is mortally wounded during the battle in the village of Ramelle. He is hit by a shell from a Tiger tank, causing him to fall and be unable to continue. As he lays dying, Ryan tells him that the planes overhead are P-51 Mustangs, which Miller refers to as "Angels on our shoulders." Ryan stands at Miller's grave in the present, indicating that Miller has passed away.
q5.vectordb: Miller dies after being shot by a sniper while trying to take out a machine gun nest. He is unable to be pulled to safety and bleeds to death.
q5.hybrid: Miller dies when he is mortally wounded during the battle in the village of Ramelle. He is hit by a shell from a Tiger tank, causing him to fall and be unable to continue.
